params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.host_port
params.description: The host and port of the on-premises instance in host:port format

params.name: data.username
params.description: The username for connecting to on-premises instance.

params.name: data.password
params.description: The password for connecting to on-premises instance.

params.name: data.ca_certificate
params.description: PEM representation of the trusted CA's x509 certificate.

params.name: data.client_certificate
params.description: PEM representation of the replica's x509 certificate.

params.name: data.client_key
params.description: PEM representation of the replica's private key. The corresponsing public key is encoded in the client's certificate.

params.name: data.dump_file_path
params.description: The dump file to create the Cloud SQL replica.
